== What does all this mean? ==
OK = Works out of the box

FIX = Requires <nowiki>[[AspireTimeline-Fixes|fixes]]</nowiki>

OK/FIX = Works out of the box for some users, FIX exists.

:-P = No known fix

? = Unknown Status
